title: Something happened while im at champion select, and I got a qeue dodge timer because of it
body:
plss click the link for the pic
It wont show any champions, I qeued for the second time and it happened again.... 
Please Help and plss remove the dodge timer or whatever..

replies.body: Its not our network its league as soon 7.10 came out my frame drop issue solved it self i have steady 30 frames now took two patches to fix it get you're stuff straight you guys are messing up i pay alot for my internet to be fast

Sometimes that can happen if your network is having a harder time than usual grabbing the champion data from our server. We should be able to get those champs loading smoother if we check up on some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Make sure to test those changes in a custom game, and let me know if that doesn't help, and we can dig a little further!
